title: What other methods can reduce 3D printing cost except hollowing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Increasing Layer heightTeach your design engineers how to 3d print and ho to specifically design for 3d printingDesign the part specific for 3d printingUse topological CAD software to reduce unneeded materialdChoose a cheap materialChoose a cheap 3d printing technology f.e. FFF/FDMBuild and use your own diy 3d printer

One major aspect that influences cost is, surprisingly, part orientation for printing. If the part is at an angle, then a significant part of the cost is building supports then cutting them away after production. Tough nut to crack, as sometimes you just cannot make the part without internal supports needed only for printing.
